trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a resource reference key cannot be found during parsing or serialization of markup extension resources.
trans-unit.target: 所剖析或序列化的標記延伸資源期間找不到資源的參考索引鍵時就會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref>類別指定的序列化資訊和資料流內容。

trans-unit.source: Specific information from the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: 從序列化程序的特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The context at the time the exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified error message and resource key.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref>類別具有指定的錯誤訊息和資源的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key that was not found.
Reports specifics of the exception to debuggers or dialogs.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵錯工具或對話方塊報告例外狀況的細節。

trans-unit.source: Specific information from the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: 從序列化程序的特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The context at the time the exception was thrown.
Gets the key that was not found and caused the exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 取得找不到且造成擲回例外狀況的索引鍵。
